name: Gekitou Pro Yakyuu: Mizushima Shinji All Stars vs. Pro Yakyuu
overview: Gekitou Pro Yakyuu: Mizushima Shinji Allstars vs Pro Yakyuu (激闘プロ野球 水島新司オールスターズVSプロ野球) is an arcade baseball game released in 2003 for Triforce arcade hardware. It was only released in Japan, and was ported to the PlayStation 2 and GameCube.
